transcript:

Executive: Uh you are TV Muralidharan right sir?

Executive: Sorry?
Customer: I am Soman here the same company paranjoloo.
Executive: You can tell me.
Executive: Uh from HNG Techno Mart na?
Customer: Yeah correct.
Executive: Okay okay you are the owner sir?
Customer: Yeah we are partners sir.
Executive: You are partner okay this is partnership firm na sir?
Customer: Regarding what you contacted you tell me.
Executive: Sir I call you regarding uh we have received your email.
Customer: Uh huh?
Executive: Sir we have received your mail feedback sir. Uh I think your concern is very uh curious relevant leads na in your uh profile HNG Techno Mart sir. You have not received any relevant leads. I think this is your.
Customer: You are talking from where? You are talking from where?
Executive: I am talking from IndiaMART sir Yashika this side.
Customer: Oh IndiaMART okay okay okay okay. Uh I told you first sir I am I am from IndiaMART. Actually this is your concern na sir.
Customer: Yeah yeah.
Executive: This is your concern na sir coconut virgin oil correct.
Customer: Correct uh ha yeah.
Executive: Okay okay. So uh sir what kind of I am helping you sir?
Customer: It is not clear what you are talking.
Executive: Sir actually I received your feedback I received your feedback that you have not received any relevant leads regarding. Oh yeah we are not receiving relevant inquiry. This is your concern na sir this is your concern.
Customer: Yeah correct. So what you uh what is your primary product sir? What is your primary product and what what is Our primary product virgin coconut oil plant and machinery. Tubular bowl centrifuge extractor.
Executive: Okay okay.
Customer: Milk extractor centrifuge tubular bowl high speed centrifuges vibro sifter.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: You can see our website you can see all the products.
Executive: Oh okay I am seeing. Can you see my website www.hngcentrifuge.com. Uh by 15 November you have received one inquiry from uh from Coimbatore India right? So uh this is from Surya.
Customer: We have not received relevant inquiry. Today also today also I received a milk extraction machine sir.
Executive: Yeah today I received a milk extract inquiry I contacted him he want cow milk extractor.
Customer: Okay okay okay. Or already we are doing coconut milk extractor.
Customer: Achcha achcha okay. You are doing coconut yeah na?
Customer: Yeah coconut milk extractor coconut processing. Yes yes. And tubular bowl centrifuges. I am finding sir wait sir. Vibro sifter.
Executive: Sir this is your WhatsApp number?
Customer: Yeah it is the WhatsApp number.
Executive: Uh can you repeat sir?
Customer: 93 1 93 49 Wait wait 93 na?
Customer: 93 93 9349 Yeah 40 40 40 3007
Executive: 3007 right?
Customer: Yeah correct. I repeat sir 9349403007.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: And your name is?
Customer: Soman.
Executive: Uh can you spell?
Customer: Soman S O M A N.
Executive: Okay. Sir uh so I know uh I related to your uh related to your product and sending you some buyleads sir. You can consume it or share me the feedback please uh on my WhatsApp number sir please. Okay. Okay or uh this is your primary number mentioned here starting from 93 and ending from 005 sir.
Customer: This is my number okay. This is also your number?
Customer: 9349403007. Last digit is uh 05.
Customer: That is Muralidharan seven is nine.
Executive: Sir actually I am not uh looking the full number. I have I have only uh five digits. It starting two digit 93 and ending three digit 005 sir. So this is number.
Customer: 3007.
Executive: Seven seven is your number sir this is alternate number. Primary number is mentioned here uh last digit three digit is 005 sir.
Customer: Okay okay okay. So who who are using sir?
Customer: I am seven Soman.
Executive: You are using seven na sir?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Okay. I am sending you here sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer not receiving relevant buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the primary product.

- Executive will send buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive verified the WhatsApp number.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp number, primary product, inquiry
